sentences.en: " Hic - hic - Goddess Kuanyin protect and preserve us I Hic - "
sentences.cn: “ 呃,呃,救苦救难观世音,呃 —— ”

sentences.en: According to ancient legend, the river is a goddess.
sentences.cn: 据古代传说, 这条河是位女神.

sentences.en: Aphrodite was worshiped chiefly as the goddess of human love.
sentences.cn: 阿芙罗狄蒂主要是作为人类的爱神而受到膜拜的.

sentences.en: Every god -- even Zeus himself -- wanted this " beautiful, golden goddess " as his wife.
sentences.cn: 每个神 —— 甚至宙斯自己 —— 都想要娶这位 “ 美丽的, 绝色的女神 ” 为妻.

sentences.en: For this revelation he was struck blind by the goddess Hera.
sentences.cn: 由于揭露此事，他被女神赫拉弄瞎了眼。

sentences.en: He adored her as a goddess.
Liberty is not a crowned goddess , beautiful, in spotless garments, victorious, supreme.
sentences.cn: 自由可不是什么头戴冠冕的美丽的女神, 穿着洁白无瑕的衣裳, 象征着胜利, 至高无上.

sentences.en: Raquel Welch was at the height of her popularity as a sex goddess.
sentences.cn: 拉克尔·韦尔奇作为一名性感女神红极一时。

sentences.en: She dreamed of becoming a Hollywood screen goddess.
sentences.cn: 她梦想成为好莱坞的银幕女神.

sentences.en: She was still a screen goddess at the pinnacle of her career.
sentences.cn: 她仍然是一位处于事业巅峰期的银幕女神。

sentences.en: The Silkworm Goddess had been beneficent to the tiny village this year.
sentences.cn: 今年蚕花娘娘保佑这小小的村子.

sentences.en: The word Easter derives from Eostre, the pagan goddess of spring.
sentences.cn: Easter（复活节）一词由Eostre（多神教的春天女神）衍生而来。

sentences.en: They adored her as a living goddess.
sentences.cn: 他们把她当作活女神崇拜.

sentences.en: Venus was a goddess worshiped by the Romans.
sentences.cn: 维纳斯是罗马人所崇拜的女神.

words.tran_cn: 神；（大写首字母时）上帝；vt. 膜拜，崇拜

trans.tran_cn: 女神，被崇拜的女人，非凡的女子，绝世美女
trans.tran_en: a female being who is believed to control the world or part of it, or represents a particular quality
